comments: Joe (OKC) leans forward slightly as he firms up in Micic's (CHA) path and the contact during the screen is marginal.
Wiggins (OKC) lowers his right hand down and legally brushes the ball after Micic's (CHA) gather.
Mann (CHA) contests Joe's (OKC) jump shot and the contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
Williams (CHA) brings his left arm down by his side as he firms up over his left leg and marginal contact occurs with Giddey (OKC) during the pick.
Play is stopped due to a clock malfunction. After the correction, play resumes with Oklahoma City retaining possession.
Wiggins (OKC) brings his arm towards the ball and marginal contact occurs with Mann's (CHA) arm at the start of his dribble in transition.

Mann (CHA) briefly fumbles the ball and is unable to begin a controlled dribble as he moves up the floor. Mann then legally brings two hands to the loose ball, which gathers it, and begins a legal dribble in transition.
Dort (OKC) brings his hand towards the ball and legally brushes it during Mann's (CHA) drive in transition.
Williams (CHA) and Holmgren (OKC) briefly engage in marginal arm to arm contact during the pick.
Wiggins (OKC) extends his arms out to Miller's (CHA) sides and Wiggins maintains contact that affects Miller's FOM during his cut off-ball.
Mann (CHA) brings two hands to the ball as he comes together with Giddey (OKC) at the same spot on the floor and the contact is marginal.
Giddey (OKC) avoids making any contact with Bridges (CHA) during his legal contest of the jump shot attempt.
Williams (CHA) commits a take foul on Giddey (OKC). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Bridges (CHA) commits a take foul on Dort (OKC). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.

Wiggins (OKC) moves into and through Williams (CHA), which dislodges him from his legal screening position. The illegal contact occurs prior to the ball being inbounded and a foul away from the play is correctly called.
Wiggins (OKC) rests his hand on Williams' (CHA) side as Williams collapses his forearm against his body and marginal contact occurs as the two players disengage off-ball.

The play originates outside the LDB. Wiggins (OKC) is the secondary defender and does not establish a legal guarding position outside of the RA prior to contact occurring with Miller (CHA), affecting the driving shot attempt.
Miller (CHA) commits a take foul on Giddey (OKC). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Dort (OKC) moves slightly into Miller's (CHA) path and he absorbs the marginal contact as the two players come together during the drive.
Miller (CHA) slightly extends his right arm and marginal contact occurs with Dort (OKC) as he retreats during the drive.
Williams (OKC) legally contests Miller's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
